duties_responsibilities.duty: Support, mentor, and motivate the hourly workforce.
Manage safety, quality, productivity, and customer delivery promises.
Collaborate with support teams to develop plans to meet business objectives.
Lift and handle packages up to 49 pounds.
Work in a physically demanding environment with varying noise levels and temperatures.
Continuously climb and descend stairs at the work site.
Lead and manage a team of 20+ employees.
Execute process improvements and lean techniques.
Ensure customer orders are delivered at the right time and location.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or 2+ years of Amazon (blue badge/FTE) experience
